Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params._creationFee: The fee (in wei) for creating a new raffle
params._minTicketPrice: The minimum ticket price (in wei) any raffle must have

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newFee: The new creation fee in wei.

params.newPrice: The new minimum ticket price in wei.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

rafflesCreatedBy.details: user => array of raffleIds they created

getFactoryBalance().notice: Return the current ETH balance of this factory (the creation fees).

getRaffleCount().notice: Return how many raffles exist in the MultiRaffle engine.

getRafflesCreatedBy(address).notice: Return all raffleIds created by a user.

minTicketPrice().notice: Minimum ticket price any raffle must use.

pauseFactory().notice: Pause the factory (owner only).         No new raffles can be created when paused.

totalFeesCollected().notice: Total fees collected so far (in wei).

userdoc.notice: A factory contract that creates single-winner raffles in `MultiRaffle`.         Users pay a creationFee to spawn a new raffle, and each raffle must         have a ticketSize >= minTicketPrice.
